column4: hey I have a problem with my ff always being slow, everything else is pretty quick except ff...
I saw a fix that involved an edit of the xorg.. I have yet to track it down.
It works fine when you turn off effects correct
I have all the effects turned off to my knowledge...
I dont have info on that fix the guy was talking about...
Opera has a whol;e different set of issues
Please dont use rude shorthand in here
you mean form install os using cd as repo?
thanks, should've checked for a package first anyway
I cannot connect to the remote desktop using the external IP... does ubuntu have a firewall turned on by default?
Enable port forwarding on the router
forwarding is setup for the laptop and this machine is DMZ
DMZ allows all connections to a specific IP
any ideas on why it wouldn't connect from the external IP? router is setup fine...
